show.subtitle: Your Economic Survival?  They're Not Looking Out For You.  We are.
show.title: The Wake Up Call

title: Democracy: The American Dream
content:
The mid-term elections and the October unemployment report, both from last week, show the emptiness of the system. They were both fake.
John Greer’s new book: Dark Age America: The End Of The Market Economy talks about the results of an increase in social complexity.
The institutions of the world have not kept up with reality.
What’s going on with job cuts?
Some surprising facts.
The ‘smart money’ is abandoning the housing market.
Hungary is being punished by the US and E.
U for daring to question the perceived wisdom about Russia and Putin.
Britons think internet access is more important than washing, according to a new survey.
Phones and tablets should be out-of-bounds- during meals and in the bedroom.
The perils of being wrong: interview with David Freedman who wrote a book on this subject entitled, “Wrong: Why Experts Keep Failing Us – And To Know When Not To Trust Them.
